title: Increase wall-frame label size and add neon green edge glow

requirements.text: Increase the 3D label text size for the behind-counter wall frame (the "Seven Balance" WallFrameLabel) so it is clearly readable from far away across the room in both the basic fallback room and the full scene dressing implementation.

quotes: Make that font bigger like clearly visible in whole room

acceptanceCriteria: In the BasicCafeRoomFallback menu board label, the rendered "Seven Balance" text is visibly larger than before and remains crisp (not blurry/pixelated) when viewed from the default camera position.
In the CafeSceneDressing menu board label, the rendered "Seven Balance" text is visibly larger than before and remains crisp (not blurry/pixelated) when viewed from the default camera position.
The text remains centered on the label plane and does not clip outside the label area.

requirements.text: Add a neon green glow effect to the edge of the behind-counter rectangular frame (the menu board frame) in both the basic fallback room and the full scene dressing implementation.

quotes: add a neon green glow to that frame edge

acceptanceCriteria: In BasicCafeRoomFallback, the menu board frame edge shows a clearly visible neon green glow when viewed from the default camera position.
In CafeSceneDressing, the menu board frame edge shows a clearly visible neon green glow when viewed from the default camera position.
The glow effect is applied to the frame edge (not the whole wall/board surface) and does not introduce obvious z-fighting artifacts.

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend.immutablePaths (e.g., frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui/*).
Keep all backend logic in the single Motoko actor (backend/main.mo); no new backend services.
nonGoals: Do not add new authentication methods or external integrations.
Do not change unrelated scene lighting, navigation controls, or UI panels beyond what is needed to enlarge the label and glow the frame edge.
